text: As predicted, gas will soon hit $5/gallon across the country. Worse yet, Democrats ignored warning signs months ago much like they did inflation.

Today, @HouseJudiciary Democrats objected to my amendment to provide funding for school safety.

We need action, not politics.
Schools need funding for commonsense safety measures to protect against gun violence.
Sec. Yellen saying, "Oops I was wrong" about inflation doesn't cut it. This administration's policies have obliterated the wallets of Americans.
